skillTree.localised_description: This stinky hog is as grumpy and fierce as its brutal rider.

effects.description: Mount: War Boar

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: When Gorfang's chariot rides to war, there is little that can stand in the way of his terrific charge.

effects.description: Mount: Orc Boar Chariot

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: Wyverns are highly-prized mounts for the most powerful of Orc Warlords.

effects.description: Mount: Wyvern

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Tunnel bosses are Greenskins who are good at shoutin’ and hollerin’ at mobs when underground, where space and sight is an issue.

skillTree.localised_description: A Bellower’s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield, making sure the boyz are focused on the carnage.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%

skillTree.localised_description: Choppa's out, ladz, we're goin' beard huntin' again!

skillTree.localised_description: Gorfang is one of the mightiest Orc Warbosses, described as being as large as an Ogre and renowned for hunting and slaying Trolls for sport.

effects.description: Armour: +20
Physical resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Many of Gorfang's battles have been fought against Dwarfs, including the siege of Barak Varr and the attack on Karak Azul. As a result of his long struggles, Gorfang has acquired an unreasoning hatred of the Dwarf race. During the siege of Barak Varr he ordered the severed heads of Dwarf captives be catapulted over the walls and into the city.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Frenzy" when fighting against Dwarfs
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +20 when fighting against Dwarfs
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Youz wanna know how da boss got da name?"

effects.description: Hit points: +10%
Passive ability: "Regeneration"

skillTree.localised_description: "The betta the metal, the betta the murderin'!"

skillTree.localised_description: Gorfang's tribe, the Red Fangs, is currently the most powerful Orc tribe within the area around the western end of Death Pass. Gorfang has subjugated most of the local Orc tribes.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -50% for all Orc Big 'Uns units

skillTree.localised_description: "'Arder than 'ard! Dead 'ard!"

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.localised_description: Orc choppas are crude and hefty blades usually swung with violent joy by their owner. A choppa in full swing can have a brutal, crunching impact on the poor fool on the receiving end.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.localised_description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.localised_description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Ability: "Deadly Onslaught"

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

factionEffects.localised_description: Gorfang is an immensely strong Orc. He lost an eye at the Battle of the Jaws, and wears an iron patch to cover the wound. Many of his battles have been fought against Dwarfs, including the siege of Barak Varr and the attack on Karak Azul. As a result of his long struggles, Gorfang has acquired an unreasoning hatred of the Dwarf race.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: -120 with Dwarfs
Diplomatic relations: +40 with Greenskins
Can make trade agreements with other Greenskin tribes
Allegiance points gained: +50% for alliances with Greenskins
Armour: +10 for all Orc Big 'Uns units
Recruitment cost: -20% for Big 'Uns units
Gorfang Rotgut steals a percentage of XP earned by other Lords

items.colour_text: The Red Fang is an enormous serrated sword. As heavy as a the giant Cave Squig, Gobbla, Gorfang nevertheless wields it with ease.

effects.description: Ability: "The Evil Sun Armour"
